DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Double-blinded , Double-dummy , Parallel-controlled Multicenter Clinical trial Investigate Blonanserin Treatment Schizophrenia compare Risperidone
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Study Investigate Blonanserin Treatment Schizophrenia When Compared With Risperidone
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , Double-blinded , Double-dummy , Parallel-controlled Multicenter Clinical trial Investigate Blonanserin Treatment Schizophrenia compare Risperidone Trial drug : - Blonanserin group : Blonanserin tablets+Risperidone mimetic tablet - Risperidone group : Risperidone tablets+Blonanserin mimetic tablet Objectives Study : To evaluate efficacy safety Blonanserin treat schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Subject meet DSMIVTR criterion primary diagnosis schizophrenia Patients 18≤age≤65 year age day inform consent obtain . Subject PANSS total score ≥70 120≥ Screening Subject score ≥4 PANSS Screening Baseline . Subjects willing able comply study protocol include treatment hospital . Subjects legal guardian sign write informed consent form . The subject treatment Investigate product within 30 day . Subject history treatment longacting drug anti schizophrenia within 56 day . Subject history treatment clozapine within 28 day . Subject With parkinson disease , etc
